div.p: I come from South Africa which is a very, very different lifestyle to England so that was brilliant. And as I said as I went into teenage years
my parents split up quite traumatically and we had to go in hiding so there was a lot of kind of uncertainty and very quickly had to grow up
and be a support to my mum as oppose to the other way round and, you know, that had negative effects, I mixed with the wrong crowds
and you know I partook in illegal substances and that was really, it really kind of pulled me back in life. Lessons donâ€™t just come in a positive form
they can come in a form of this is maybe the wrong way to do it and recognising that...
